We see him quickly become pinned as the prime suspect and the events surrounding Zero’s attempt to clear his name. Full of slapstick humor that will undoubtedly make you laugh, the film is constructed in a magnificent and elegant manner where all the characters get their chance to shine. Even the smallest roles (the crippled shoe-shine boy and the man with a scar on his face) still have an impression on the movie as a whole, and it never feels too ‘written’.Ralph Fiennes delivers a striking and hilarious performance unlike anything he’s ever done, and works well alongside scene-stealers like Adrien Brody and Edward Norton. The movie’s fast-paced and distinct style may not be everyone’s cup of tea, but if you’re a fan of Wes Anderson this will be another great film to add to the collection. It is now available on Blu-ray and DVD.

I think most people realize that when going into feel-good sports movies, particularly when they’re produced by Disney, they shouldn’t expect a masterpiece. The majority of these kinds of films rely on true stories and are designed to pull at your heartstrings, and usually they succeed in doing so. But from my point of view they have become a bit lackluster recently, constantly being churned out as a quick moneymaker. We used to see great flicks like “The Mighty Ducks” and “Remember the Titans” every few years but these kind of movies now come few and far between. And though Disney’s newest movie “Million Dollar Arm” certainly isn’t a substitute for those, its characters and lively tone elevate the otherwise dull story.Set in 2008, the film follows J.B. Bernstein (Jon Hamm), a down-on-his-luck sports agent who will soon be run out of business if he doesn’t close the next big deal. Inspired by his best friend, he gets the brave idea to find and train Indian cricket players to become pro baseball athletes in America. Setting up a competition throughout India called Million Dollar Arm, we see his journey and eventual struggle to complete what he started.A bit generic at times and not without its flaws, the movie stumbles along the way. The pace is a tad too slow (not to mention the two hour runtime) and it takes a little while to warm up to the characters. But by the end, I’ll admit I was extremely invested in the story and was having fun. Rated PG for mild language, “Million Dollar Arm” is light-hearted and entertaining.
Very emotional and raw. I loved how the characters weren't sugarcoated and all their idiosyncrasies weren't shyed away from. Give it a watch. This movie just may surprise you.

When the tagline for your movie is ‘Live. Die. Repeat’, you’ve got me from the jump. But with the added combination of Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt running around in metal super-soldier suits kicking major butt and saving the world, then I know it’s really going to be great. I’m aware that Cruise hasn’t exactly been having his greatest couple of years, need I remind you of last year’s “Oblivion”, but he’s still managed to keep up that “Risky Business” charm throughout some of the lower points in his career. And after seeing his newest film “Edge of Tomorrow” I’m pretty sure he won’t be falling back into a slump anytime soon.This new action-epic centers around an officer (Cruise) who, during a war with an alien race, is forced to relive the same day over and over until he increases his skills enough to defeat the enemy. Meeting a woman who has already faced the same challenge (Blunt), he teams up with her to fight and die repeatedly as each alien encounter gets them one step closer to triumph.A sort of juiced up, special effects heavy version of 2011’s “Source Code”, it’s the most entertaining sci-fi flick you’ll see all year. Tom Cruise delivers one of his best performances of the decade and works terrifically alongside Emily Blunt, with their back-and-forth providing comedic relief from beginning to end. Rated PG-13 for language and action, “Edge of Tomorrow” is a fantastic spectacle meant to be experienced on the big screen.

I've been buying Caterpillar boots for years and I'm used to a certain level of quality. They look great and the sole, lower and upper appear to all be good quality. The lack of quality is where the sole is joined to the lower. The first day of wearing them, I lightly stubbed my foot on a chair and the front proceeded to come unglued from the sole. I still like caterpillar boots, but if this is their new level of craftsmanship I'll have to look elsewhere. I'm hoping it was just an uncommon defect.

I can't speak highly enough about this shoe rack. First of all, it was super easy to put together and I had it up and on the door within ten minutes. I was a little worried about it not fitting my door or not being able to close it with the rack on it, but I shouldn't have worried - everything was fine. It's great for organizing and saving space, and it's great for stuff other than shoes too. I don't have nearly enough shoes to fill up the rack, so I've put other stuff on it to utilize the space, like small storage boxes full of odds and ends that don't have any other place in my room. There's tons of space, a lot more than I thought there would be to begin with, so it really helped me cut down on clutter. It's also really sturdy, which makes it well worth the money. Most racks you see are pretty flimsy, but I have tons of stuff piled on this one without any bending or strain. The shelves are adjustable and everything is well made, and it doesn't seem to cause any damage to the closet door either. Overall, it's a very good buy and I would definitely recommend it for any closet!

This was a wonderful guide to start my son out on with pokemon! It explains how to play, very simple to understand, and it shows the pokedex. Wonderful guide for beginners, I would have liked to teach everything to my son myself but I don't have time, so this is the next best option. Highly recommended, especially for beginners.

Great guide that helped my son and saved me from having to learn the game to teach him everything. Very simple and easy to read and has pictures to help you understand too. It's very thorough in explaining the game and is great for beginners. We had no problem with it and I would definitely buy it again.

I got this game guide for myself since my son plays Minecraft and wants me to play it with him. It has some good information and was easy for me to understand even though I've never played the game before in my life. Good tips on how to play and it easily got me good enough to play with my son. Highly recommended.

I got this guide so my son could learn how to play the game without asking me every few seconds. It was very clear, to the point, and easy to understand. He learned a lot and loves playing it. Definitely worth the price I paid, and I would buy again.

Really helpful guide. It was easy to understand, enough so that my son figured it out by himself without having to ask me for help. He loves the game and I'm glad he was able to get it without me figuring it out for him. Definitely worth the money, and it has good tips too.

Had no problem downloading on Kindle with the help of this guide. It has very simple instructions (simple enough that my young son figured it out by himself). Also has some good tips on gameplay so he didn't have to ask me for help all the time. Worth the price in my opinion.

This was a really handy guide for my son, and he loves the game. It has really good step by step instructions on how to download and play the game. Great advice for beginners who've never played before, but even if you already have the game downloaded, it has some good tips on how to play. Highly recommended.

This is a really great monitor for parents. I love the fact that it's in color and you can zoom in - it really puts my mind at ease to be able to see more detail and make sure everything is okay. It has tons of extra features and it's a huge step up from the monitor I had before, but it isn't confusing to figure out at all, so it's suitable for parents who aren't as tech-savvy. It's a really great deal for all the features you get. The screen is great quality, color is accurate, sounds are clear, and you can even see well at night when the lights are off.

These are great! I really don't like most spacers because they're uncomfortable and make my feet cramp up, but these are the most comfortable ones I've ever worn. They don't spread them so wide that you get cramps, just enough to align everything and keep you from getting bunions. Small enough that I don't have problems wearing them in any of my shoes and no discomfort whatsoever. Highly recommended!

I got this for my son to read since he recently downloaded this game. It had good info about how to download it if you haven't already and how to play. I love guides like these because it means I don't have to spend forever learning to play the game so I can help him if he has questions. This book does it for me, and it's easy enough to read that he can understand it with no problem (he's 10). I definitely recommend it if you're interested in the game.

I thought it was very helpful. Has lots of good information about how to download the game and how to play. I got it for my son since I don't know enough to help him, and he was able to download and play it just fine with the help of this guide. Clear and well written enough that even young kids can understand it.

I thought it was very helpful. I got it for my son since he started playing the game recently, but since I've never played it and don't have time to, I wasn't able to help him when he got stuck. I got him this guide and it's helped a lot more than I ever could have. I read over it before giving it to him, and it has good info about the game, tips, and tricks to help you with strategy. I highly recommend it.

Well written, clear, and concise. Helped me get past the level I was stuck on! It has lots of good information about the game I didn't know before, even though I've been playing it for a few weeks, and it's very easy to understand. Great tool if you're stuck on a level or want to improve how well you play.

I love it! Works exactly as described and the screen quality is wonderful. For such a good price I didn't expect much, but I am very impressed. The picture quality is very good and it's well put together and sturdy. Comes with very clear instructions and is easy to figure out how to set up and use. Highly recommended.

This is wonderful for keeping children (and adults!) entertained in the car. More handy than having to hold the tablet yourself while you're watching something, and it offers extra storage space for things you bring with you in the car. We've made it into a "traveling entertainment center" with the tablet, puzzle books, coloring books, colored pencils, and more so we'll always have something to do on long trips. It's well made and spacious without being bulky and getting in the way. It's a must-have for traveling!

I already have way too many leather bags (I have a pretty big collection), but I just couldn't pass this one up. The colors are very unique and so pretty - it's even prettier in person. It's slightly smaller than most of my other ones, but that's a good thing since it isn't bulky and still pretty roomy on the inside. The buckles are good quality, too. You get a wonderful bag for the price; I've seen similar ones sell for three times as much.

I love the looks of leather bags, and this one is probably one of my favorites. I have a pretty large collection, too, so that's saying something! I've had it for a few months now and used it quite a few times without any damage or wear and tear. It's holding up very well and it's made of really great quality leather. I usually use the shoulder strap, but the hand strap is great too and seems very durable. Love it and will probably be getting another one to give as a gift.

I had no problems with it! It came exactly as described and worked well. I was a little hesitant about buying it at first but I'm glad I did; you get the same (or maybe better) quality for less money. It came with everything I needed to make it work and I've been using it for a few months now with no problems or defects. I would definitely recommend it.

I found it very easy to set up and use. The instructions are very clear and it's not difficult to figure out! It works as promised; I have it in my car and I haven't had any problems with it at all in the past few weeks that I've been using it. The price is great and it's a much better deal than everything else I looked at and considered. Very small and portable and works great.

This is a really great resource if you know someone with an eating disorder. Someone very close to me was recently diagnosed with one, and I wanted to learn more about it in order to be able to help. This book is great for learning more about the different types and what to do and what not to do if you have a friend with an ED. Everyone needs to educate themselves about it so they can be more sensitive and not offensive, and this book was very well written, detailed, and comprehensive. Would definitely recommend.

I tried to learn how to play chess when I was young, about 9 or 10, but it never made sense to me (probably because I was so young), so I stopped. I recently decided I wanted to learn how to play since I have a friend who likes the game a lot. He didn't have time to teach me but referred me to a few books, this being one of them. This one was the most helpful by far and I'm actually understanding it better now. I know the basic rules, but this book helped me a lot with my strategy (and it covers the basics, too, if you're a beginner!). Definitely a must read if you're learning how to play!

This book actually has some really good advice that has been helping me a lot! It's very well written and isn't a bore to read like I was afraid it would be; I found it very interesting and helpful and read it in one sitting. It's very informative and a lot of the advice it gives you actually worked for me. This is definitely worth the price for a different perspective on how to stay motivated and get everything done.

I got this for my best friend who recently got engaged. They're in a tight spot when it comes to money, so this is definitely coming in handy for her. It's very comprehensive and covers everything you can think of when it comes to wedding planning (it also makes a good checklist of things she needs to spend money on for the wedding!). Very well written and has good advice on how to cut corners and budget without sacrificing a wonderful ceremony.

Really helpful guide about mindful eating that gives you realistic expectations. It was an eye opener about why we might think the way we do about food. It really made me rethink my diet and reform my relationship with food. It's a very good guide to go by if you're looking to improve your eating habits in a healthy way.

This book has some pretty good tips that I haven't come across before and it's a lot cheaper than an anger management class. It's very well written and easy to read, so it wasn't hard to get through. Great for giving you a push in the right direction by explaining techniques for how to deal with and manage your anger in different situations. I would definitely recommend it to anyone with anger management problems who is looking to get them under control.

This is a wonderful travel guide. New York is so big and has so many attractions that I wasn't sure where to start, but this guide did a great job of hitting the highlights as well as a few places I would have never thought to go before reading about them. Does a great job of telling about a mix of popular favorites and lesser known attractions so that you get the most out of your trip. Very comprehensive, helpful, and easy to understand; must have if you're planning on a trip to NY.

I'm used to just using a digital watch, so it took me a little while to get used to this one, but I actually prefer it. It has tons of functions so you can use it for just about anything. The strap is very pretty black leather and it's very strong and high quality. I've gotten several compliments on it and I've only been wearing it a little over a week. Definitely my favorite watch out of all of them I've ever owned.

I was looking to replace my old dresser (I got it in a yard sale years ago, so it's been slowly falling apart) and decided on this one. The price is very good for a dresser of this size and quality, and it fits perfectly between my bed and the wall. I don't have the hutch that's designed to go with it, but I'm considering getting it since I like the looks of the dresser so much. It's a very pretty color and unique design. Highly recommended.

I love this keyboard! It's very unique looking and lightweight, but still durable. I use it with my iPad and it works great. It's large enough that you can type easily but not so large that it's bulky or gets in the way. I've never seen a keyboard that was made out of bamboo before, and I really like that it's so unique and cool looking. It's really easy to hook up to a tablet or a phone, even though I've only used it with my phone once. All you have to do is hook it up via Bluetooth. The battery life lasts forever, and it comes with a cable to charge it when it dies and an easy to understand user manual.

I've been looking for a job for almost a year since I got out of college, and I really think this is what helped me to finally get one. It has templates for just about anything you could think of that you might need: interview follow-ups, negotiation, acceptance letters, thank you letters, even rejection letters. I have not used all of them, but I have everything I might ever need just in case. It's definitely worth the price you pay for the amount you get. It gives you an edge over other people who don't have letters that are as professional and makes you stand out from the crowd and be noticed, which can make a big difference when you're job searching. They all look very impressive and I got compliments on them from several places where I landed a follow-up interview. If you're not having luck finding a job, I definitely recommend trying these to give yourself an edge.

This was a Valentine's gift for my girlfriend. It was a lot cheaper around Valentine's day; I paid around $12 for it and I wouldn't pay more than that, so wait until the price is reduced to get them. They were fresh and tasted great. It's a lot of chocolate, and it lasted us for weeks. We would buy more, but the price is higher ($18 at the time I'm writing this). Maybe that's for the best though since it was A LOT of chocolate!

I would have much preferred getting these flattened out instead of rolled up since it's been really hard to get them to stay on the walls since they keep rolling up. They arrived in perfect condition, though, and they're really pretty - a lot better looking than I thought they were going to be. They were a gift for my girlfriend and she has them hanging up on either side of her dry erase board. They're really cute and she loves them.

It's really rough feeling, so it's definitely more for decoration than comfort. Also, I had a really tough time getting the pillow in since the opening was not as wide as a whole side. About 2/3 of one side unzips so that you can put the pillow in, so you have to really stuff it and then straighten it out once it's inside the pillowcase. It's really pretty though and I love the picture. I don't regret buying it.

I purchased this faraday bag to protect sensitive electrical equipment. I’m a computer analyst and frequently carry around ram sticks and hdds and other equipment on flights and have had a handful get wiped or corrupted in the security scanners. Since purchasing this bag and after four round trip flights, I’ve yet to have another incident. Some lesser faraday bags will still let wifi penetrate the fabric due to the higher frequency but that doesn’t seem to be the case with the Black Hole bag. I’ve tested it against normal radio, wifi, cell signal, Bluetooth, RFID, and GPS. It has some of the best shielding of any bags on the consumer market. Probably because it’s designed and has the specs of military and law enforcement grade shielded bags. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase and would definitely recommend to anyone needing a quality faraday product.

I purchased this collapsible strainer for my RV because it is a collapsible product and saves space which is limited in an RV. I loved the product so much I bought another one for home. It is a space saver and very functional. I would recommend this item as a must-have for every kitchen. It is easy to use, easy to clean, and folds down for easy storage. I love love this stainer, and I will never buy a regular one again.

I got this guide for my son along with another racing game guide, and he loves both of them. They tell him how to install the app, which is good because I wasn't able to help him. They also have instructions on how to play and be good at the game. He uses the guides all the time and they save me a lot of time trying to figure out things to help him. Highly recommended.

I got this for my son because he likes racing games. It told him how to install it and everything. He's been playing it for a while now and he loves it, and he always has the guide open while he's playing it. Good value and I wouldn't hesitate to buy again.

I started playing this game recently and got stuck on a level. This guide was what finally helped me get past it. It has really good cheats and tips and was well written and easy to understand. The game is a lot more fun now that I can actually do well at it. Definitely worth the money.

I got this lamp as a gift recently and I'm in love! It's very unique looking, which I actually didn't like at first, but it's grown on me. It doesn't take up much space since it's so slim, so I can fit it in on my desk even though it's pretty small. It's touch sensitive and has different modes of lighting, so I can dim it at night so it won't hurt my eyes if I'm trying to read or do some work. Very neat design and it works great, so I would recommend it.

I try to do detoxes regularly since I'm trying to switch to clean eating, but it's not always possible since I have a tight schedule and limited budget. Since I can't eat healthily all the time, I try to make up for it by using detoxes. I was using a detox drink that got good reviews, but it wasn't working well for me, so I switched to this after a friend recommended I try detox pills instead. I didn't know a detox could work this effectively. I noticed a little difference on the other detox I was using previously, but the difference with these is huge. I'm more energized, I feel better, and it's cut down my craving for sugary foods. I've always heard that one reason you crave sugary foods is because you're used to them and that detoxes help with that, but especially after the crappy detox I was using before, I didn't believe that until now. I still have to eat it occasionally, but it's a lot easier to be healthy when I'm not craving it as much. I definitely recommend this brand if you want a powerful and effective detox.

I've worn glasses for most of my life, but my eyes seem to be getting worse more quickly lately, so I've gotten more concerned about it. I started doing some research about how to delay vision degeneration and there was a lot of articles talking about all the vitamins you could take. I found these pills and they had most of the vitamins I read about, so I decided to try them. I've been using them for a few months now, and I just went back to the optometrist yesterday to get my eyes tested again. The decline in my vision has slowed down a lot since the last time I went in, so I'm very happy I found these pills. You can get these vitamins through certain foods, but it's a lot easier to just take a pill and make sure you get the amount you need! The price is affordable, so I've stocked up on a couple bottles so I won't run out. I'm very glad I found these since they're helping my eyes so much - I just wish I had found them sooner!

I've noticed that my hair has been thinning lately, probably due to stress. I've also never been able to grow a full, thick beard, so I figured I could try to improve both with this supplement. I didn't notice much difference the first couple of weeks, but I'm finally starting to see some change. I keep my hair pretty long, and I've noticed that it's gotten stronger and doesn't come out as much when I brush it. I might just be imagining it because it hasn't been very long at all, but I also feel like it's gotten thicker, especially near the roots. Either way, I'm really looking forward to how well it works as I continue taking it since I've already noticed a difference. As for my beard, I noticed improvement a lot quicker, about a week and a half in. It's still patchy in some places, but it's thicker than it's ever been before. I plan on ordering another bottle since I've had good results with this one. I'm willing to bet I'll be ready by the time November rolls around!

I'm not sure why, but I've noticed that I've been feeling fuzzy and am not able to remember things as well lately. I've even been to the doctor about it, but nothing that was recommended has helped. I finally decided to look for something online and came across these. I was a little worried about taking a pill that wasn't prescribed or well known, but all the ingredients seemed okay so I decided to get a bottle. A few days in, I didn't notice much difference, but I kept taking them anyway in the hopes that they would start working. After a little over 2 weeks, I am noticing a change. I'm more clearheaded and able to focus better than before, which has really helped my memory. My memory was never the main problem in my case, it was just the fact that I never felt clearheaded, but this pill has helped with both. Since I feel more alert most of the time now, my memory has gotten better as well.

I'm in love with these headphones. They are very unique looking, which I like, and they work great. The sound quality is phenomenal, as is the microphone. I saved up to get some nice headphones because I'd been using cheap Wal-Mart ones with horrible sound quality and a horrible speaker. The difference in these is extreme - they're so much better quality and have so many more features. I have absolutely nothing negative to say about them - they're great. Definitely worth every penny.

These are definitely the best headphones I've ever owned. They're very comfortable to use when working out or just for talking on the phone. The sound quality is amazing, and the microphone is pretty good too. I'm not used to this style of headphones, so it took a little getting used to, but I definitely prefer them over traditional headphones or earbuds. For the quality they are, the price is great. I would definitely recommend them for any purpose, working out or otherwise.

Mosquitoes are starting to get bad again in my area since it's starting to warm up, so I got this bug spray since I don't really like any of the other sprays on the market. I like it very well so far! It smells a lot better than others I've tried, and it's deet free. It works very well; I haven't gotten a mosquito bite yet. It's small enough that I can carry it around with me pretty much anywhere. I'll definitely be buying more!

These are a great solution for at-home workouts when I don't want to go to the gym. I ended up getting these bands and some weights to use at home, and the bands are actually my favorite. The weights I can just use for my arms, but these you can use for your legs too. They're much better quality than all the others I've tested out and I'm very happy with them. Plus you can layer them to get more resistance if you want to. They're durable and keep their shape. Perfect at-home solution to build muscle.

I got this as a gift for my friend's baby shower, and it was very well received. The red is a nice neutral color, so it made a good gift. It was the gift she was most excited about, she even took it out and tried it on during the shower. It seemed like it was good quality, so it was a good buy in my opinion. Recommended.

This is so much better than a standard leash. We recently got a puppy (he's a mutt, but I don't think he's going to get very big), and walking him on the normal leash was a pain since he'd get himself and me tangled up. This helps cut down on that issue since it's retractable. It can extend pretty far - definitely further than the other leash - so he's able to roam around more and have more freedom. Very sturdily made and much better than normal leashes.

This is a wonderful brush to use on large shedding dogs. It works better than anything else I've ever used, and he loves it, too! The ends are rounded so it doesn't hurt him when I'm brushing him. He's always liked it when I brushed him before, but he seems to particularly enjoy this brush since he sits still longer when I use it rather than the other one we have. Very effective and well made, so it's sturdy to use even on very thick fur.

These books are super cute for young children. I've been reading them to my son, and he loves them. He has a hard time reading on his own, so we usually read together, but these are simple enough that he's able to read a majority of the words himself. Still, the plot is great, and he enjoys being able to think about the mystery himself and try to figure it out. We've already read it three times, so I'm going to get another one in the series for him! They're entertaining and fun for young kids, a perfect way to pass the time and promote learning and critical thinking at the same time. I would definitely recommend Spy Pets.

I think what made these pills work so well for me was how well they suppress your appetite. I've been trying to lose weight for a while now, but I'm actually getting results now with the help of these. One of the hardest parts of weight loss is keeping my appetite under control and not being hungry. These pills help a lot with that - I'm not nearly as hungry as normal and it doesn't take as much to fill me up, either. It's helped me cut down on snacking and it's helping me eat healthier, too. I haven't noticed any negative side effects, and I have absolutely nothing bad to say about them! They're worth every penny, especially if you want results.

Works just as well as the normal shea butter, and I can't decide which one I like better! I think this is more convenient since I can carry it around with me if I spend the night somewhere. It leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth - works great on dry skin and eczema, which is what I mainly use it for. It doesn't leave your skin oily or greasy, either. Wonderful quality shea butter for a great price.

This is my favorite skin product. It smells nice and it isn't too greasy (I hate using oily lotions or skin products, so the fact that this is not is a big plus for me). I mainly use it for dry skin and eczema, and it works better than any other moisturizer I've ever tried. I've also been putting it on a few scars I have just to test it out and I'm actually seeing some results! They are slightly faded and look better, so I'll continue using it on them and see how well it works after another couple of months. I definitely recommend always having a jar of this on hand.

This stuff works amazingly. I originally got it to use on eczema (it did great, by the way), but since then I have also tried it out on acne and rashes and it worked well for both. I'm very picky about what I put on my skin, but this doesn't smell or feel bad and has great results, so I have no problem with it. I generally use it at night before I go to bed and it's more effective then (for me, anyway) than if I put it on in the morning. It works great for skin health and I would definitely recommend it!

This is great for every skin condition I've tried it for so far. I originally got it to use on eczema, but it also works wonders on acne and even rashes. It's nice to have something that will work pretty much no matter what is wrong with your skin. The price is affordable and it comes in a cute bottle with a squirt lid. It does not smell bad or feel bad on the skin, so I have absolutely no complaints about it.

It fits my HP laptop and my iPad perfectly without being too bulky. It's well made and the straps are securely attached - the one I had before this had flimsy straps that broke and caused me to drop my laptop (it was fine, but still not something I want to risk). This one works great, however, and can hold up to the weight of my laptop and iPad at the same time. I really like the look of the bag, too. Definitely a 5 star product.

I'm very impressed, especially with the fact that it has pockets for your laptop and your tablet. I use both at work, so it's nice to have a bag that's specifically made to fit both and that isn't cramped if I try to put both in it. It's well made and durable and my iPad and laptop both fit in it great. I carry it with me every day now and it's made my life a lot easier. I definitely recommend it.

Perfectly fits the Kindle 7th Generation, which is the Kindle that is just called the "Kindle."  It does not fit the Kindle Paperwhite.It accommodates the bulky jutting-out rear panel of these cost-reduced Kindle devices well and protects them well.  The magnets are exposed which aren't exposed on the Paperwhite version of this case, but that shouldn't really bother you.  The texture is a nice touch, too.

A very nicely thought-out HDMI to DVI Adapter cable.  It has a woven jacket to help the cable fit nicely around furniture between your HDMI-only computer and your old DVI-only display device, or, perhaps more rarely, between your old DVI-only computer and your modern HDMI display device.
It fits perfectly on the Fire HD 6, which is a pretty bulky tablet, .
Works on pretty much any Android tablet to copy files from your tablet directly to any USB thumb drive.
It's a little bulky but it fits perfectly on the Fire HD 6, which is a pretty bulky tablet, anyway.

While testing this out, I found that only one of the ports supports the non-standard Android 1.3A charging mode seen on some devices from Samsung, older Google Nexus, and the older Barnes and Noble Nook HD and HD+.  If your device was purchased within the last three years you will get full charging speed on the 2.1A and 2.4A ports with no trouble.

Works great for that rare time when your case and motherboard don't agree on what the front ports require.Even though this is a cheater adapter, you can usually get USB 3.0 from those front ports with this gadget.  Nobody really minds having USB 2.0 on the front ports, so this is a good fix for an occasional problem.

It works and you might not need drivers for it on Windows 8 and better.  It really achieves gigabit speeds when using USB 3.0.  Perfect for your UltraBook that has no wired network connectivity at all and you don't want to buy the wildly overpriced DockPort combination adapter from Acer.
Picture is fine all the way across the room.Cable is rather thick due to the extra cables and shielding requirements of HDMI that you will never use, like Ethernet.

Picture is perfect from an UltraBook or Mac clear across the room to an HDTV.The cable is very thin and light.  I wish I could find an HDMI-to-HDMI cable this thin and light.Works with all Mini-DisplayPort laptops:  Mac, UltraBook, and cheap DockPort (mostly DisplayPort-compatible) laptops like the Acer Aspire V.
The game stops before it even gets started on the Kindle Fire HD.  At least it was a free app of the day.
Low resolution and laggy port of a phone game to a high res tablet.  This game is not even worth free.

Finally, a mechanical keyboard that is tenkeyless with a perfect size and layout.  Most tenkeyless keyboards over the years have had weird layouts trying to be as small as possible, like the Poker and the Happy Hacking keyboards, and this makes those keyboards just not practical.  This keyboard, along with an ALPS clone model from Ducky, will set the trend for tenkeyless keyboards that are laid out exactly the same as full-sized keyboards but simply with the tenkey pad sliced off.Build quality is very good (made in Taiwan) and the keys are mounted solidly on a metal plate.  It comes with a keycap remover and some extra keycaps.  I've already spilled liquid into it and it still works fine thanks to the mounting plate.I have some observations after several months of daily use.  The keycaps have become shiny, much like what happens to laptop keyboards.  Second, the rubberized coating on the bezel is probably not going to stay perfect for much longer--it should be a matte, plastic finish instead.All space-saving keyboards should have this layout.  Life is too short to learn a new layout.  After several months, I'm still really happy working eight to eighteen hours per day on the tenkeyless version of the CM Storm Quickfire Rapid.

This is not appreciably faster than any other 1.8 or higher amp charger when used with my Kindle, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD, various Android tablets, and other devices that have USB charging cables.It also blocks an adjacent outlet.  Why didn't they put the plug on the short end like the original black-and-white Kindle charger?It is an exceptionally good deal when purchased together with a Kindle Fire HD on promotion, but the regular price is not competitive for a supposedly premium charger.Additionally, it does not come with a cable, an omission that many people won't realize.**EDIT**  I appreciate the many comments, but Amazon promotes this charger as something that charges faster than other chargers, but I haven't seen any such advantage.  At promotional prices, it's a good deal, but not at almost twenty dollars.  Otherwise, look elsewhere.**EDIT**  When the review was written, the description of the item did not have this statement "Optimized for Kindle tablets: PowerFast is a 9W charger and will charge your Kindle tablets faster than the white 5W Kindle charger will."  That line was added a considerable amount of time after I wrote my review.

I do not know if it is either the Kindle Fire and Kindle Fire HD CPU or its graphics capability but I have to say that this game plays much better on the Google Nexus 7 than on the Kindle Fire.  Perhaps Android game developers should instruct the device to stop all background operations when playing games because this game runs perfectly for a while on the Kindle Fire and Kindle Fire HD but starts bogging down after a few moments presumably due to the Kindle Fire/Kindle Fire HD performing some background tasks that could very well have waited for later.Otherwise, the pinball tables are as good as or better than those available for Visual Pinball and VPinMAME for the Windows PC which are considerably more difficult to install and use.  This is a great app.***EDIT*** I have noticed a problem when playing this game on the Kindle Fire and Kindle Fire HD which is most likely related to the graphics drivers on these Amazon devices.  Every now and then you might get an alert that tells you "Goal 1 Completed" or similar.  When this happens the frame rate of the game goes down by half.  This doesn't happen on the Google Nexus 7 or other Android 4.1 and better devices that I own but it does happen on the Kindle Fire and Kindle Fire HD.  It does happen on older Android 4.0 and earlier devices, but it does not happen on my original Kindle Fire with a very recent Android Jelly Bean mod which suggests, at least to me, that it's not a hardware limitation but a software or operating system limitation in the customized Android operating system used by the Kindle Fire and Kindle Fire HD as delivered by Amazon.

Ever since I got my Zune I've been trying to figure out who makes these excellent headphones so I can buy them at a more affordable price.  Now that the Zune product line has been discontinued so are these headphones and the price has gone down to a reasonable level.The only other headphones that sound as good as these are the ones that came with some of the original XM Satellite Radio portable units (which are also discontinued).  I use padded headphones because I've tried to use the ear canal headphones but they are too noisy for me unless I sit very still.Get them before they're gone!!  In the meantime I'm still looking for padded headphones that sound as nice as these do.

The Kindle edition is not readable due to formatting errors and missing pages.  No matter which font, line spacing, or words per line the text runs off the screen.Perhaps this is the reason the price was a promotional zero dollars.

This cover, when ordered in 2011 and later, works great with no problems at all.  The hooks are non-conductive "gold" color and cause no problems on my Kindle Keyboard (also known as the Kindle 3) release in 2010.I had already purchased the older version of this cover in 2010, which, after the paint finally rubbed off the hooks, shorted out the battery of my Kindle 3.  I asked Amazon to replace it with the "new redesigned version" of this cover and they very nicely sent me the complimentary 2011 version of this cover to replace my old one, and I can report that it works perfectly now.I am happy to report that the current version of this cover that you get when ordering this item does, indeed, NOT cause the battery on the Kindle 3 to die after 24 hours.  It's an unfortunate design defect in the original version of this cover but it is completely solved by this new, redesigned version of the same, excellent cover.Oh, and for those who are worried about "folding it back" on itself, this cover surely can be folded back on itself.  While this new version of the original cover is a bit stiffer than the original, it can, definitely, be "folded back" on itself with no problems at all just like the original.I feel bad that Amazon had this unfortunate problem with batteries shorting-out with the older version of this cover, but the current version that you get when ordering this item works perfectly and is highly recommended.

These are great for about five years.  Perhaps due to the constant high temperatures they eventually wear out.  These are the only hubs that can put out full power to all seven ports which is probably why they get so hot.  I've had two of them burn out after five or six years which you'll have to form your own opinion about.

I have a drawer full clone Bluetooth dongles that either don't work with Windows 7 64-bit or they have the same MAC address.This Asus Bluetooth dongle is the real thing.  It works on Windows 7 64-bit and has all the necessary Bluetooth profiles.And, best of all, it has its own, unique MAC address.  That way if you have more than one computer in your house and you want to use both of them from your Bluetooth device they won't cancel each other out.If you paid less than ten bucks for your Bluetooth dongle, you're throwing your money away.  The Asus dongle comes with a driver disc, a user manual disc, and has the MAC address printed on the outside of the package.

Be careful if getting more than one of these Bluetooth dongles. I have a handful of dongles that are identical to this one but are sold under many different brand names from several dozen different Amazon vendors. The dongles interfere with each other because many of them have the same MAC address. MAC addresses are supposed to be universally unique but these off-brand dongles are not unique. This can confuse you and your other Bluetooth devices. More than once I have paired a Bluetooth phone with the wrong computer when two computers use the same brand of Bluetooth dongle even when the Bluetooth device name is changed.It gets very hot, but most cheap Bluetooth dongles do, probably because the radio is very powerful and possibly non-FCC-compliant. My basement Bluetooth dongle can be reached from the second floor.The trouble is that it's hard which dongle to buy except by price and the photo. This design is cloned, re-cloned, and cloned again by several dozen different factories in the far East. If it seems very cheap, just keep in mind that you may run into problems when using more than one of them in the same location.It works in Windows 7 64-bit and Windows 7 32-bit with no driver required.

This sleeve is nice, reversible, and smelly.  You can turn it inside out to get a grey color if you like.The material (neoprene?) needs a few days to air itself out.  The smell sticks to my hands and to my Barnes and Noble Nook Color but I'm sure it will go away eventually.

**EDIT See EDITS at the bottom.**The AMD processor is very fast.  Compared to the HP Mini 311 with nVidia ION graphics, the Acer with AMD Fusion processor is computationally faster and the graphical performance is  the same.The screen is this netbook's biggest disappointment.  Compared to other 1366x768 monitors like the HP Mini 311, the Acer has a slightly noticeable moire pattern and as a result is not as sharp as the HP.  If you watch movies, you won't notice this, but if you do any sort of productivity work it can be distracting especially if you're sensitive to that sort of thing.The prominent Netflix application works almost perfectly watching HD programming.  The battery life is longer than the HP Mini.  It is also much lighter to carry than the HP Mini is.The keyboard is functional but not for touch-typists.  It has a noticeable warp and flexes upon use.  The HP Mini's keyboard is much nicer than this Acer's keyboard.The Acer is very easy to upgrade and even has PCIe ports so you can replace the wireless card, but you really wouldn't need to since it works wonderfully.  Performance on Windows 7 Ultimate is acceptable with the included two gigabytes of memory.When considering this netbook it is important to compare its screen side-by-side to other 1366x768 netbooks since it is by no means a high-quality screen.There is no hard drive LED.  This is actually a good thing since they are distracting.  Since I keep picking on the HP Mini, which has many distracting bright white LEDs, I prefer the Acer as it only has three subtle LEDs, none of which blink incessently like on the HP Mini.  Thankfully the wireless LED does not blink, either.The screen opens almost flat, to almost 170 degrees, so you can get to the correct viewing angle on the tray table on an airline or train seat.  This was my biggest complaint with the HP Mini which only opens to a very restrictive 130 degrees.  This is a good thing, because the Acer's rather poor screen has very limited viewing angles compared to the HP Mini.I am glad the netbook market is rejecting the foolish Intel Atom platform's restrictive, useless, low-resolution 1024x600 screens.  The 1366x768 resolution is ideal--this is normal for AMD Fusion but unusual for Intel Atom netbooks like the HP Mini and Dell that can be special-ordered with the higher resolution.  The 1366x768 resolution should be the new standard.I like this Acer.  You will save hundreds of dollars over the nearly comparable HP Mini line.**EDIT**I just put in a 4 gigabyte SODIMM and it works a bit faster.  The item is:Patriot Signature 4GB 204-Pin DDR3 SO-DIMM DDR3 1333 (PC3 10600) Laptop Memory Model PSD34G13332SThe carrying case is:Case Logic LNEO-12 12.1-Inch Neoprene Netbook Sleeve (Black)If you are looking to re-install and want the correct drivers, you can find them on the Recovery partition (Drive D:).  Set Windows Folder Options to "Show hidden files and folders" and un-check "Hide protected operating system files."  Then copy the directory to external storage and re-install the system from the USB drive installer from Microsoft.**ANOTHER EDIT in 2012**I recently procured a new version of this netbook laptop with the AMD C-60 and higher-quality graphics with discrete graphics memory.  That new version has a much better screen without the moire pattern problems and it has no problems running Netflix and other internet video providers without special configuration.

This is a great picture book with rare photographs.  Like it or not, it is published by Amtrak folks, but the pictures don't lie.  This is a worthwhile, historical record of the same caliber of the Making of the Washington DC Metro book.  It's has several photographs of rare scenes, including one of the infamous Union Station Washington DC Visitors' Center, something that has curiously few photographs to see.If you're a fan of passenger trains and understand the significance of the forty-year anniversary of a public/private corporation that was designed to fail, you need this book.

This battery is just as good as the original, which means, you'll save lots of money, but it might not hold a charge after a year.  This is just like the original battery, however, which costs several times more than this item does, and also dies in about a year.  I highly recommend this as a good alternative to the over-priced OEM batteries for these otherwise excellent radios.

This is the famous "Blue Cube" PS/2-to-USB adapter that lets you use your old-school PS/2 keyboard with your USB-only computer.  It works perfectly with IBM Model Ms of all vintages, as well as the occasional PS/2 Unicomp keyboard, too.  Since this is a keyboard-only adapter, it provides the full 500 milliamp USB power current to power your favorite, vintage keyboard.If you're going to get this adapter, though, be sure to also get a little three-inch USB extension cable.  This adapter, unfortunately, will obscure adjacent USB ports.  This isn't a problem on Dell computers which typically have four or more USB ports, but in a pinch, the USB extension cable is recommended.  It's offered by Amazon as an add-on purchase for this reason.

This Slingbox is excellent for standard definition viewing both within the home and remotely.  I have used both methods.  You really don't need high-definition if you're viewing it on your iPod Touch or remote laptop.  Chances are your upload speed from your house won't handle high-def and the download speed of your remote location, especially if it's a handheld device, won't handle high-def either.  The software does let you select resolutions up to high-def, but 640x480 is the limit for standard-def and you're not going to see any difference if you set it any higher.This is an excellent solution and the fact that you can watch your video from Slingbox.com is simply astounding.  Remote viewing from handhelds is a nice touch, too.For practical use, I think that hooking a TiVo Series 2 DVR to a Slingbox is the optimum solution for catching up on those shows you like.  You can manipulate your TiVo through the Slingbox viewer both on the PC, on mobile devices, and on the "Watch" feature on Slingbox.com.  Slingbox provides a "controlling" mode that lets you use the TiVo remote control in a relatively quicker mode so it's easy to use it over a remote connection.  Then, when you select what you want to watch, put it back in "high quality" mode where the optimzed Slingstreaming processing takes over.Finally, for home use, you can manually set up all sorts of media settings, including audio and video quality, key frames, bit rate, smoothing, resolution, and others.  It's fun to configure if you want to limit bandwidth on your home network.Highly recommended.

This is the cost-reduced version of the Razer BlackWidow mechanical keyboard.  The Cherry Blue keyswitches are just as perfect as they are on more expensive keyboards and provide pleasant feedback.  You still get the amazing, programmable firmware feature which is something I have never seen in any other keyboard.  You can program practically any key on the keyboard to be another key, a macro, or whatever you like.  It's simple to turn off or reprogram that annoying left Windows key so you don't accidentally switch out of your full-screen game.  For programmers you can even reprogram the Caps Lock key to the Control key right from the Razer's configuration utility.The feet are really grippy so you might have trouble sliding it around on your desk, but I really think that is the point, since this is a gaming keyboard.  There are dedicated macro keys to the left which may throw some people off.The glowing blue logo is a nice touch.  Highly recommended.
The daily Monday through Friday editions are superb but do not buy individual issues on weekends.  The weekend edition has only three or four short article summaries.

The new layout for Kindle newspapers is very well thought-out and a pleasure to read.The Sunday edition appears to be missing the Sunday Magazine.  The New York Times has its magazine.I would very much like to have the option of a Sunday-only subscription but I am content with manually purchasing it every Sunday.I really want the Sunday magazine back.**EDIT** The May 1, 2011 edition does have the Magazine again.

I enjoyed this book even though I'm not familiar with this region.  It helped me understand the geography of Penn Central and helps me try to understand why Conrail did not quickly break PC back into the constituent NYC and PRR sections sooner.  Unlike much of the Northeast, of which I am most familiar, the regions described in this book were areas where extensive parallel and duplicative lines, yards, shops, and physical plant had to be consolidated no matter whether Penn Central merged or not.  There was simply too much railroad and not enough customers in these areas where NYC and PRR directly competed, in stark contrast to the Northeast where the two roads were more geographically separated.This book is fascinating but difficult to read due to the editing (or lack thereof).  The photographs are presented with detailed copy on the facing page in a wide, fixed-width font.  What is very odd is that there are corrections to the copy presented as footnotes, such as "Line 2 should read: This branch line goes to Cincinnati."  To my layman's eye it might appear that the copy and photographs were scanned from an earlier edition but instead of using OCR and correcting the copy the current editor just footnoted corrections.  This is not such a bad thing but these corrections are everywhere.  Some pages have more than five corrections.I recommend this book for serious railroad historians and fans of the art.I would like to see a book like this for Northeast railroads and the massive vat of worms that merged into Conrail.

This keyboard looks great but it's not for typists.  I'm not sure it's even for gamers due to some technical problems with it.Microsoft developed the Sidewinder X4 keyboard with special firmware and drivers to support a form of N-key rollover that really works.  The keyboard in this review, however, is the Sidewinder X6, and despite what its name might imply, this keyboard does not feature N-key rollover and is a significant downgrade from the X4.  It's just barely passable as any other USB keyboard is for gaming.What it does feature is a snazzy, orange backlight whose brightness is controlled by an awkwardly large knob (the other is for volume control).  The keys are flat, scissor-type switches that feel like the keys on those toy Fisher-Price laptops and it shares all of the bad ergonomics those keyboards have.  There are no riser feet so you either have to take it like it is, at the wrong angle, or stick rubber feet on the back panel to raise it to comfortable typing height and angle.  The keys are not sculpted so this keyboard cannot really be taken seriously for typists and programmers except for extremely occasional use.For gamers there are three banks of macro keys and the unique ability to swap the numeric keypad to the left side of the keyboard without powering down anything.  This may make up for a lack of N-key rollover since I've never had problems with chording or ghosting using any keyboard's numeric keypad.  Some people will like that it can be placed on the left-hand side so you can use it like a better form of W-A-S-D.This keyboard has been heavily discounted at every retailer for a couple of years.  You'll be buying new-old stock, but you'll own a keyboard that is like nothing else you've ever used.

I use this for the exceptionally affordable LG Prime touch-screen phone on AT&T GoPhone prepaid and it works well.  I got what I expected.  It's a cheap case and not as snug as I think it should be, but for this price, I really don't see a reason to complain.  When I first got it there was a bulge but it eventually form-fitted the phone pretty well.The case actually does cover the side buttons, but it has thoughtful bumps where the buttons should be, so you will not have any trouble finding the side buttons.  If you were to drop this phone this case will protect it.  No matter how you drop it there is no part of the phone that will come in contact with any surface and the skin is soft enough to protect the phone.Owners of these phones know that the screen is practically unscratchable but the shell of the phone is a scratch magnet.  This is a good case.

I had watched this webcam to see if it ever went below "overpriced" and it finally did, so I bought a two-pack for a really good price.  I was disappointed to say the least.  The camera is grainy and while it does have good color reproduction the graininess and lack of speed over the USB 2.0 bus was alarming.  All the reviews touted the glass lens, as if that matters, when it's the sensors in this camera that is the main disappointment.  Pictures are over-saturated and low-light exposure is overly grainy.  The thing is, these two combine for a low-quality picture that doesn't compress well over an internet connection due to all the grain and blurriness.Even though this aging, expensive camera is now available a more reasonable price, I still recommend trying the new store-brand, generic UVC cameras instead of this one.  This camera is outdated and not really a good value.  The $25 generic UVC camera is definitely a much better value and delivers a better picture than this one.The Lifecam software has great effects that are a lot of fun.  I hope the newer generation of Microsoft cameras are better when it comes to picture quality and frame rate without blurrying.

I bought two of these.  They're great clocks for about two years.  They're accurage, really big, easy to read, and reliable for about two years.They last about two years and after that they start going crazy.  One of them is still working and I'm afraid to touch it.  The other unit started having trouble getting the clock signal even though it's on the second floor of the house.  Then its second hand stopped moving but it still kept time.  Most recently it failed to reset itself to DST I replaced the battery and the arms just spin in circles forever.  I gave it two hours of spinning, and even took it apart to see if I could remedy it, but it's dead.  The reset button and manual set buttons also stopped responding.  Another model I gave to someone started doing the same thing.So, they're great clocks for about two years.  Then you will have to buy a new one.  For some reason when these fail, they fail without possibility of repair.  Get it on sale (which happens often).  The regular price for this clock, even for a clock set by WWVB atomic clock radio service, is obscenely and offensively high for only working for two years.

I used this with my SkeeterVac and am not going to use it anymore.  The reason is pretty serious: the TacTrap it attracts every insect, not just mosquitoes, and that is not good for the ecology.  Within one evening it was coated with gnats, about a hundred harmless moths, honeybees, and several other kinds of harmless, flying insects that I can't really justify trapping.The SkeeterVac's carbon dioxide attractor is more than adequate for my yard.  All I want to do is attract the mosquitoes away from humans, and the SkeeterVac by itself does a great job for that without the lure cartridge or TacTrap.

This book has excessively good detail about several projects the author had been involved in modernizing the Long Island Rail Road.  It appears to be authentic, but the bias is too obvious.  The LIRR, in the author's view, is the epitome of an organization paralyzed by unionism.  The supposedly amazing efficiencies proposed and implemented by the author were supposedly undone to further the union's vice-like grip on the LIRR.I have an impartial view, but I am left with a yearning to know more about the "other" side of the story and the real reasons why his ideas were rejected, subverted, and/or placated.  Was the author really an ignored reformer?  I cannot know after reading this enjoyable book.  I need more context to understand what happened during the author's tenure at the Long Island Rail Road from a different point of view.

This radio is impossibly small and has unexpectly good sound through the external speaker.  I bought it only for external listening but I can say that the earphone is compatible with stereo headphones--that is to say that it plays monaural audio through both earphone channels.The AM reception is superb.  I don't know how they did it in such a small package; perhaps they used their experience with shortware receivers in this radio.  Very sensitive FM reception but it has a touch too much resistance for fine tuning.  On the other hand, the volume knob needs much more resistance because I found myself accidentally muting or blasting the audio.  It also has a rather fragile FM antenna that does not swivel or sweep at all--you bend it, you break it.At this size it's a good compromise.  The FM is nothing to write home about but the AM reception is just incredible for such a tiny radio.

This is a great hand-held transistor-radio-style radio for use without headphones.  I specifically bought this and a competing Kaito model for headphone-free portable radio listening.  I had been moving my excellent Sony shower radio for a couple of years but realized only recently a decent, tiny portable would be a better idea.I use this to listen to internet and satellite radio broadcast by an in-home FM transmitter.  This radio is sensitive enough with a frighteningly long whip antenna for its size.  It distorts at a volume just slightly higher than comfortable listening at arm's-length.  It sounds much better than the Kaito but not as good as the Sony shower radio.There are some things I don't like about the radio.  For one, the antenna only sweeps left-to-right.  It does not swivel, and swivelling it will break it.  Second, in the lower third of the FM band the radio picks up its own internal electronic noise and creates a "hum" as you raise the volume.  This doesn't happen in the middle and top end of the FM band.  This isn't such a big deal for my application because I would just move my FM transmitter's frequency into the non-noisy area of the band.  However, if you like listening to things like NPR that are on the low end of the band you cannot turn the volume too loudly without this humming interference.  Finally, the earphone jack is wired for monaural headphones so the ubiquitous stereo headphones will play out of one speaker, and very quietly in the other speaker.  I bought it for non-headphone use so this doesn't really matter to me.  It does work fine with the C. Crane monaural pillow speaker.I thought twelve dollars was a little costly for a radio of this size and quality but it seems to be the going rate for good name brand, transistor-radio-style radios.

I struggled through this book on my Kindle and I regret not getting the hard copy.  The story is engrossing and is about on par with "The Making of the Atomic Bomb" by Richard Rhodes.  The book's first part deals with more detail about the weapon's development including new accounts of the German and Soviet bomb-making teams, but you don't read about anything but the USA in the second two-thirds of the book.The focus is on the frequent nuclear tests and the fallout that has poisoned most of the United States and other countries.The highly-detailed accounts of many nuclear shots emphasize the fallout aspect.  It is a great book to read if you're interested in not just the science but the social implications of nuclear testing and the fallout that occurred in communities all over the United States.**WARNING about the Kindle Edition.It's a great book but do *not* buy the Kindle edition.  Frequent misspellings, unreadable (and unlinkable) footnotes, and bleed-through of what appears to be a very bad 300 dpi OCR scan, page headers/footers interrupting the body text, and unacceptable line breaks make reading this thing a chore.  They didn't even run this through a spelling checker.  Shame on you, Amazon, for charging ten dollars for this sloppy scanning job.  The only thing I can say positively is that the table of contents seems to work.  I'm lodging a complaint about this shoddy Kindle book.**EDIT** I'm tolerating the Kindle Edition, but anything that quotes a number is suspect.  The OCR process did not capture numbers accurately so I'm not sure if they meant 10% of all units or if they really meant 10 units.  The OCR software apparently has had a hard time interpreting percentages, footnote numbers, and any other numeric value.**EDIT** I have finished the book and do not recommend the Kindle edition.  The last third of the book consists of pictures and footnotes and are just not legible or readable.  I'm very disappointed with this shoddy Kindle OCR scan obviously done by someone who sawed the binding off and fed it through a scanner using the consumer version of some OCR software that came with the scanner.  I'll be buying a hard copy to appreciate the last third of the book and implore you not to buy the Kindle edition.

A fun colorful bowl with the flexibility to take on the road with you whether on vacation or a day hike just collapse it and your ready to go.  I was pleasantly surprised at how large it was, which is important because I have 2 dogs. I've actually switched my plastic bowls at home for these as well. My dogs are absolutely in love with the bowls. I think the silicone keeps the water cool and provides more cushion on the mouth and tongue. I couldn't be happier If my dogs are happy.

This was my first time buying anything closely remote to a mosquito repellent you can wear, let alone a wristband.  I bought the 10 pack with my family in mind, and we've gotten great use out of them.  Perfect for camping trips, great for night and day hikes.  The wristbands not only protect you from mosquitoes but other bugs as well like nats. They're safe for adults and kids and easy to use...you just slip them on, no button or brace needed.

A must have for your house deco, i use them back and forth from my dinner table to my living room table.  I can't drink a beer or have a glass of wine without them and if i do it's cause I'm not home, haha.  They're colorful, they're well made and flexible with a bottom  grip to prevent any sudden slippage and the actual art work of the fruit slices is good.  If you're looking for cool coasters to have a drink with your friend or to just crack open a can of soda with your kid, these are suitable for all occasions.

This card has a certain personality to it, endearing, heartwarming, and welcoming.  The water colors make it feel personalized for both the giver and the person receiving it..it's soft and subtle but full of love and life.  With that, the simple but sweet design on the front lends itself to opening up on the inside and letting your words shine for that special person. Each card comes wrapped up to prevent any bent edges and the textured  paper is quality, thicker than I expected which is a big plus.

I had tried Garcinia Gamboa before but this was my first time using and hearing of Garcinia Cambogia, which sounds similar but is much more potent marking at 95% HCA. I'd say give it a week and maintain a routine to really feel the effects kick in.  Starting with a higher energy and a boost in your metabolism. It's helped me cut back on food, from reducing my cravings for sweets to indulging in late night snacks...it curbs your appetite without making you feel jittery or empty.  A great way to cut back on weight without having to take a whole cocktail of different supplements and proteins.

One of the most important, beautiful..powerful and deadly inventions of all time. The tank revolutionized the way a was fought and won, and the army who was able to advance the complexities of the tank came out on top most of the time.  The book covers the origins of the tank, the battles they were used in, the way they were built, how powerful they were, and ultimately what they achieved.  From the famous tanks like the German Blitzkrieg to other lesser famous but just important tanks like the British El Amaein.  As get deeper in the book, you begin to see the big picture which is, what would war 2 be without the use of tanks..or where would this world be without tanks.

A in depth look into one of the the most gruesome eras of history and what would come to be the most costly wars of all time, in human loss and financially. It covers everything from the invasion of Russia to the ultimate battle of Berlin in which Hitler would fall, but it's what you find in between those times, in what makes this look at history so intriguing yet devastating at the same time. The book is filled with facts I've never known like Churchill sending Stalin a note warning him of the German invasion but Stalin didn't believe him thinking he was inciting a war between Germany and the Soviet Union in hopes of distracting Hitler from invading England.  It talks about the tragedy of large numbers of captured Russian solders being taken to the Auschwitz camp and marched to the chambers, essentially being one of the first occupants of the camp.  To me, it serves as a reminder of the brutality and a place our world never wants go go again.

If you're a fan of fantasy, comics, and gaming(especially Minecraft)you'll love this book.  I actually started off reading this with my kid..there's cool pictures through the book so it makes it funner to read along.  Theres a wide array of characters from boys to girl, quiet and loud, it covers a large spectrum of personalities from hero to villain.  It centers around Punchy and his group of friends taking on the task of uncovering whats going on with all the zombies and mobs going missing in the minecraft world.  They quickly find out it won't be easy as they encounter dangerous roadblocks on the way, from battling enderman to avoiding slime bobs. Witty and extremely creative, this book allows you to use your imagination and lose yourself in the moment.

A soothing way to relieve stress and complete your day with some peace of mind. I try to meditate at least 4 times a week, either morning or when I get off of work. I actually liked  a quote from the book so much I had tile deco printed out of it, it embodies the meaning of this book to me. It reads "The mind can go in a thousand directions, but on this beautiful path, I walk in peace.."  The book breaks down different type of meditations through different exercises and helps you to understand the benefits of them..A great book if you're looking for some spiritual balance in your life.

It took me a while to differentiate between digital cameras and DSLR, but after that you begin to see the beauty in the possibilities of photography. I've had my canon rebel for a few months now, but wasn't getting the most out of it until I got this book.  One of the more important things I learned is, whether it's huge or minute detail, every little single details in photography.  That single detail can bring life to your photo, or completely kill the vibe you're going for. The book covers everything from getting to know your own camera, the knobs, the position of the switches and getting a feel for the shape of it to understanding composition, shadows, what lenses to use and manipulating angles to get the picture to do what you want it to.

I have been using these products for 20 years, and I don't care what other people say, I know that these work for me. 20 years ago I lived in an exclusive condo complex in downtown Chicago. There was a hoarder that died on one of the floors. When they entered they were horrified, not only by the mess, but the roaches. Now this was not a small building, 320 condos, but when they fumigated, they ran, everywhere! I awoke to roaches in bed with me, all over the kitchen, my young child and I were horrified, as we had never really seen a roach before. This was as I said over 20 years ago. I had seen these advertised and even though I only lived in a 2 bedroom condo, I purchased 4 of them, one for each bedroom, living room, and kitchen. I never saw another roach. I have moved into 2 townhouses since then, each one was a model, and therefor the garages were used as storage for the workers. Both, I was told, by other home owners, had hoards of mice run out when the garages were emptied.  I would not have known as when I moved each time I took my Riddex with me. I purchase new ones every once in a while to replace the old ones. I still use more than you are supposed to. They never bothered my pets over the years, dogs and cats. They are supposed to work for 5 years, I think they work longer than that. I swear by these things. Riddex has now come out with a new product that emits through the air, as these emit in the walls. I purchased those also recently for spiders, I think Chicago is going to have a bad winter this year. Spiders are coming in almost everyday. This Riddex may work on Spiders inside the walls, I don't know, but they don't work on anything that may come in directly from outside, like through the garage, or a crack. So if you are expecting these to kill all the critters that you can see, forget about this. This gets rid of the ones you can't see yet. The ones in the walls. The ones you can see, you'll have to get rid of those yourself. It definitely works on critters that come in through the walls, though! I know, and am so very grateful!

I used this size for years on pet food cans, and prefered the plastic to the new soft adjustable models, but these do not fit my dogs new cans which are 13 ounces.

I have a 40 pound Cockapoo, with such thick curly hair that I have problems finding the skin for his flee drops. It usually takes me 2 days to thoroughly brush his hair, as after an hour here and an hour there, I got tired of brushing out his tangles. I just brushed his very long , at the moment, hair. His whole body in 1/2 hour! It has been 6 weeks since his last hair cut and he is very long. This makes it so easy, it's like spritzing a glass table with glass cleaner! Spray and rub in and brush. The tangles practically disappear! The ones that remain, just a quick localized spray to the tangle, and that's gone too. I have tried other so called detangler sprays, and they did nothing on this dog's curly hair. My puppy and I are so glad to have discovered this product! I hope it stays around for the next 15 years or so!

This is so cute! Looks very real. I love simple change banks, and use them! It's like a found treasure when you empty them and cash the change in! This is a very nice one as it is not the plastic that I see everywhere. I have this on a glass shelving unit in my living room, and it is very impressive, even though it isn't "real".

This is a tried and true cleaning product that has been around for many generations. Borax is a natural product that was sold before natural was "in". The oxygenated products are poor imitations of Borax. They try to do the same cleaning projects, but really don't compare. This can be used in your laundry, to clean surfaces that you can't use scouring powder on, and is gentler than scouring powder. I have been using this product around the house for many many years, and so did my mother. I am 66 years old, so it has been around for longer than that, because it is a good product that works. I have tried the others, and they really don't compare. I have 2 major neighborhood stores that carried this product and then stopped. I was so very happy that I found this on Amazon. This arrived fresh, no lumps, or humidity damaged. Better than either of the stores that sold it. I hope Amazon continues to sell this product forever, or at least for the rest of my lifetime, as I will be purchasing this here from now on.

I love acrylic sweaters. They are not heavy, yet are very warm. This sweater is very pretty, and so very soft, as acrylic sweaters always are. Washed well, and fit according to the chart. I washed on gentle warm, and dried on regular warm, and it came out beautifully!

I did not purchase my regular size, I went according to the chart, and they fit perfectly. Very cute! Not fake looking. I turned them inside out and washed on gentle warm, and dried on gentle low, and they came out perfectly.
Purchased this as a bedtime reader for my Grandtwins. Lots of colorful pictures and short version of the movie. They will love it. I do.
Very cute. They have not been used yet as I purchased for my Grandchildren for Christmas, but they look easy to use for little hands, and impatient minds.
Very cute. They have not been used yet as I purchased for my Grandchildren for Christmas, but they look easy to use for little hands, and impatient minds.

I purchased these to give cash gifts for the Holidays. These serve as a double gift as they also block RFD for your drivers license and credit cards. They are a nice size for a pocket or a purse of any size, even an evening bag. Love the simple unisex look. They look very rich.
I use sprayers for many different things around the house from spraying plants to bug spray, and these bottles work very well.
These are great bags for a great vacuum. They are easy to install, and remove. They don't rip, and they are large enough for multiple vacuuming.
I love this! I find this to be very adequate for my needs of omega fatty acids.

Such a beautiful simple and elegant earring display! I know it says necklace, but it is perfect for photographing earrings! Most are black wrought iron, or plastic, or flimsy, this is gorgeous, and sleek, and modern! perfect! Great price and fast shipping also!

No where near as strong or long lasting as the Now brand. I never imagined there would be much of a difference, but I would rather pay more for 4 one ounce bottles of the Now brand, than purchase again. A tiny bit of the Now brand made my whole house smell of flowers. This hardle affects 1 room, for 5 minutes.
Purchased these for Christmas for my grand daughter. She hasn't played with them yet, but I know she'll love them, as she is a twin, with her brother! Perfect!
Purchased this for my grandson for Christmas. He of course hasn't played with it yet, but I know he'll love it.
These are the nicest brand. Very flexible and easy to use. No longer sold in my grocery store.
Very nice for many things that need a dropper, but don't come with a dropper. I purchased this for essential oils.
So far I am enjoying this wash. Balanced moist skin does not happen overnight. I have been using soap for so many years, I need to see what this does for my skin over time, but so far so good.

Should have read the reviews. They sing. Wasn't expecting that. The music does not sound Chinese, but who knows. For me, I was planning on giving these as Halloween treats. With these voices, and that music, they would not be appreciated in my neighborhood. Kind of a waste of money unless I can think of an easy inexpensive solution.
